document.full_text: the united nations appealed on tuesday for a ceasefire in the libyan city of misrata, saying at least 20 children had been killed in attacks by besieging government forces on rebel-held parts of the city.
document.title: u.n. says 20 children killed in misrata
lines_and_colors: the united nations appealed on tuesday for a ceasefire in the libyan city of misrata, saying at least 20 children had been killed in attacks by besieging government forces on rebel-held parts of the city.
